info.title: Schema of Azure App Configuration events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure App Configuration events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

AppConfigurationKeyValueModifiedEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.AppConfiguration.KeyValueModified event.

key.description: The key used to identify the key-value that was modified.

label.description: The label, if any, used to identify the key-value that was modified.

etag.description: The etag representing the new state of the key-value.

AppConfigurationKeyValueDeletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.AppConfiguration.KeyValueDeleted event.

key.description: The key used to identify the key-value that was deleted.

label.description: The label, if any, used to identify the key-value that was deleted.

etag.description: The etag representing the key-value that was deleted.
